findings.title: OCTD - Owner Contract Tokens Drain
findings.description: Contract Owner is not able to transfer tokens from specific address

findings.title: OTUT - Owner Transfer User's Tokens
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to transfer the balance of a user’s contract to the owner’s contract by calling the `multiTransfer` function.

findings.title: ELFM - Exceed Limit Fees Manipulation
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to increase transfer fees over the allowed limit of 25%. The owner may take advantage of it by calling the `setMultipliers` function with a high percentage value on transferMultiplier.

findings.title: BC - Blacklisted Contracts
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop contracts from transactions by calling the `blacklistAddress` function, which can be exploited if the private keys of the owner's account are not properly managed.

findings.title: L01 - Public Function could be Declared External
findings.description: Public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared external to save gas.

findings.title: L02 - State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: Constant state variables should be declared constant to save gas.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: Solidity defines a naming convention that should be followed.

findings.title: L07 - Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: Detected missing events for critical arithmetic parameters.

findings.title: Divide before Multiply Operation
findings.description: Performing divisions before multiplications may cause loss of precision.

findings.title: L14 - Uninitialized Variables in Local Scope
findings.description: There are variables that are defined in the local scope and are not initialized.
